name: Lint Doctor
description: Detect your project's language and framework, then configure linting with sensible defaults -- supports ESLint (with sonarjs/unicorn), Ruff, Clippy, golangci-lint, and Checkstyle, plus optional pre-commit hooks.
longDescription: Auto-detects your stack from config files (package.json, Cargo.toml, go.mod, pyproject.toml, pom.xml, etc.) and applies best-practice lint rules with bug/security errors and style warnings. Supports JavaScript/TypeScript with React/Vue/Angular, Python via Ruff, Rust via Clippy, Go via golangci-lint, and Java via Checkstyle. Handles monorepos and offers interactive or automatic configuration with optional husky/lint-staged or pre-commit hook setup.
